title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Preserve Roads
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Preserve Roads              Preserve Roads       The map below shows all preserve roads and trails. With the exception of NM Highway 4 that traverses the southeast and southwest corners of the preserve, all internal roads are gravel, dirt roads, and road conditions can change dramatically during wet weather. Check locally for road updates.      Currently visitor vehicles are limited to roads accessing the Valle Grande Visitor Center or the Banco Bonito Contact Station.   For backcountry vehicle access beyond the Valle Grande Visitor Center, a backcountry vehicle permit or a special use permit is needed.
